definition: race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

nationalism/national self-determination/principle of nationalism, the first of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning parity between China and the great powers)/racism

pinyin: Zhong1 yang1 Min2 zu2 Da4 xue2

definition: Northern Nationalities University NNU at Yingchuan, Ningxia (former Northwestern Second College for Nationalities)
pinyin: Bei3 fang1 Min2 zu2 Da4 xue2

definition: ethnic township (formal village level subdivision of PRC county)

pinyin: Ba1 le4 si1 tan3 Min2 zu2 Quan2 li4 Ji1 gou4
containing_words.word: 巴勒斯坦民族權力機構

sentences.english: Should we dispatch cadres to help exercise regional national autonomy?
sentences.chinese: 又比如實行民族區域自治，我們派不派幹部？

sentences.english: Chinese people has never regarded human beings as the hightest creature among everything else since ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 中華民族自古以來從來不把人看作高於一切。

sentences.english: Each nationality has its own language of posture and gesture.
sentences.chinese: 每個民族都有自己的身勢語和手勢語。

sentences.english: Chinese culture sees all non-Chinese as sub-human, to be exploited.
sentences.chinese: 中國文化把所有的其他人種視爲有待剝削的次等民族。

sentences.english: A girl in Yao minority dress warmly greeting customers.
sentences.chinese: 穿着民族服裝的瑤家姑娘，熱情地招呼來往市民。
樹民族品牌，立百年基業。

sentences.english: Fourth, Northeast anti-Japanese national united front is characterized by its universality.
sentences.chinese: 第四，東北抗日民族統一戰線具有廣泛性。

sentences.english: He thoroughly takes the German national charater apart in the essay.
sentences.chinese: 他在這篇文章裏透徹地剖析了德意志民族性格。

sentences.english: In 1999, ethnic unity and progress has been exemplary Linying advanced individuals.
sentences.chinese: 1999年，獲臨潁縣民族團結進步模範先進個人。

sentences.english: In the implementation of this cross-century strategy, ethnic issues merit special attention.
sentences.chinese: 民族問題在這項跨世紀戰略的實施中具有特殊的地位。

sentences.english: However, since her return, Chapman has become something of a national hero.
sentences.chinese: 但是，自查普曼歸國後，她幾乎已是民族英雄。

sentences.english: Jing, Shi, Zi to Ji, the last of which is his specialty.
sentences.chinese: 京族是我國的一個漁業民族。

sentences.english: This strain of popular discourse and feeling in China is more patriotic than nationalistic.
sentences.chinese: 這種感覺與其說是民族主義不如說是愛國心。

sentences.english: Tang dynasty is an important period in Qidan's history.
sentences.chinese: 唐朝是契丹民族發展史上一個重要歷史時期。

sentences.english: Our packing is in Chinese national style , and suitable for display in super-market.
sentences.chinese: 我們的包裝具有中國民族風格，適於在超級市場陳列。

sentences.english: Without the Han China could never have held together.
sentences.chinese: 沒有了漢民族中國早就分崩離析了。

definition: descendants of the Fiery Emperor and the Yellow Emperor (i.e. Han Chinese people)

nationalism/national self-determination/principle of nationalism, the first of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning parity between China and the great powers)/racism
